body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps        On the top left corner of the map, toggle between two maps with different features — "Brochure Map" and  "Park Tiles."  On the top right corner in the "Park Tiles" map —  "Park Tiles Imagery" — displays park features on aerial photography of the park and Grand Portage Indian Reservation.         Minnesota State Highway Map - This will help you plan your visit to and from Northeastern Minnesota
title: Grand Portage National Monument: Maps
